amendment.description: Amendment designates $1 million to study the links between financial stress, financial abuse, and military suicide and to generate recommendations to fix such interlinked problems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $1 million in the Defense Health Program, Research, Development, Test and Evaluation account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Holt.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
